text: Belvedere is a village in Tuscany, central Italy, administratively a frazione of the comune of Suvereto, province of Livorno. At the time of the 2001 census its population was 12. Popolazione residente - Livorno (dettaglio loc. abitate) - Censimento 2001, Istat. Belvedere is about 75 km from Livorno and 2 km from Suvereto. == References == == Bibliography == * == External links == * Category:Frazioni of the Province of Livorno
title: Belvedere, Suvereto
